title: Ai Weiwei
description: Ai Weiwei joins to discuss his new memoir “1000 Years of Joys and Sorrows,” depicting a century-long epic tale of China told through a story of his family.
itunes:subtitle: Ai Weiwei joins to discuss his new memoir “1000 Years of Joys and Sorrows,” depicting a century long epic tale of China told through a story of his family.
